regret it; weep over it, you'll regret that,

1294.79.text:
too; laugh at the world's foolishness or weep
over it, you will regret both.

1298.67.text:
"Hang yourself, you will regret it; don't
hang yourself, you will regret that, too;

1303.76.text:
hang yourself or don't hang yourself, you
will regret it either way.

1307.04.text:
Whether you hang yourself or don't hang yourself,
you will regret both."

1310.57.text: This gentleman is the essence of all philosophy.
